title: Wake Up & Meditation
description: Start the day with gratitude and mindfulness. focus on breathing and setting intentions for the day.

title: Gym / Exercise
description: Full body workout session. Focus on compound movements: Squats, Deadlifts, Bench Press.

title: Breakfast & Planning
description: Healthy breakfast (Oatmeal + Protein Shake). Review daily goals and schedule.

title: Deep Work - Project A
description: Core development time for the new feature launch. No distractions.

title: Focus Music Playlist
description: Background music stream for deep work session.

title: Team Huddle
description: Daily standup meeting with the engineering team to discuss progress and blockers.

title: Lunch Break
description: Rest and refuel. Avoid screens if possible.

title: Client Calls
description: Review project requirements with Client X and discuss timeline updates.

title: Code Review
description: Review pull requests from the junior dev team. Focus on code quality and performance.

title: Listen to Podcast
description: Tech news and industry trends podcast.

title: Evening Nap
description: Power nap to recharge for the evening session.

title: Side Project Dev
description: Working on the personal AI assistant project.

title: Discord / Community
description: Mod duties and chatting with the community.

title: Wind Down / Reading
description: Reading fiction to relax before sleep.
